fields.title: multinomial logistic regression
fields.pointers:
* Here are some other commonly used multiway classification algorithms:
**  [naive Bayes](naive_bayes)
**  [multi-class support vector machines (SVMs)](multiclass_svms)
* Multinomial logistic regression is a  [discriminative model](generative_vs_discriminative) .
* Multinomial logistic regression is a kind of  [generalized linear model](generalized_linear_models) .
fields.summary: Multinomial logistic regression is a generalization of logistic regression to the case where there are more than two categories.
